_sText:
This is my second jail map and finally, it is my last map ever.
This map has 30 spawns for Ts and 20 spawns for CT.

Map contains several elements, which arent very common.
1) Each cell has vent, but only one cell per round has destroyable vent.
2) Each cell has a chance to have a pistol, but only one pistol can be found each round.
3) Cells can be opened automatically (60 sec) or manually and automatic opening can be disabled by button.

Armory has a lot of weapons, which quantity isnt limited.
- Pistol p228
- Pistol FiveSeven
- SMG Mp5navy
- SMG P90
- Rifle Famas
- Rifle M4A1
- Sniper Rifle Scout

Armory is protected, so only CTs can open it (from front side).

Of course, there are some well-known games like:
- Simon Says
- Jump Rope
- Disco with DiscoGame (similiar to bench room)
- Race 1vs1
- Gun (or bomb) Toss
- Last Reaction (up to 5 players)
- Talent Stage
- Swimming Pool (competitive swimming for 3 players)
- Football (or soccer) with scoreboard (up to 5)
- BasketBall with scoreboard (up to 5)

And some important rooms like:
- Armory
- CT spawn
- 3 small rooms with buttons, which can open doors on CT floor
- Hospital
- Small sancutary dedicated to Yellow

!IMPORTANT!
To play football properly, server should have phys_pushscale 200 (or more). I fogot to set it in my map.
